organization_id.description: ID of the organization that created the model

model_family_id.description: ID of the model family this model belongs to

fine_tuned_from_model_id.description: ID of the base model this was fine-tuned from

description.description: Detailed description of the model's capabilities and use cases

release_date.description: Date when the model was released (YYYY-MM-DD)

announcement_date.description: Date when the model was first announced (YYYY-MM-DD)

license_id.description: ID of the license governing the model's use

multimodal.description: Whether the model supports multiple input/output modalities

knowledge_cutoff.description: Date up to which the model has training data (YYYY-MM-DD)

param_count.description: Number of parameters in the model (in billions)

training_tokens.description: Number of tokens the model was trained on (in trillions)

available_in_zeroeval.description: Whether the model is available for evaluation in ZeroEval

source_api_ref.description: URL to the official API documentation

source_playground.description: URL to an interactive playground or demo

source_paper.description: URL to the research paper or technical report

source_scorecard_blog_link.description: URL to scorecard or evaluation blog post

source_repo_link.description: URL to the model's code repository

created_at.description: Timestamp when the record was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the record was last updated
